settings.heading: PICKLEBALL TOURNAMENTS
settings.description: The Pickleball Amateur Series is a year-round series of round-robin pickleball tournaments held throughout the U.S., leading into a season-ending championship.  Register now to enjoy this world-class experience!

settings.sub-heading: PLAY PICKLEBALL IN GOLDEN TICKET, AMATEUR SERIES EVENTS

settings.heading: PUNCH YOUR GOLDEN TICKET IN NEW JERSEY
settings.description: Compete against the best and secure a Golden Ticket at the Robbinsville Pickle House in New Jersey from Dec. 11-15, 2024.

settings.heading: UTR Sports: Macon Open
settings.description: UTR Sports is headed back to Rhythm and Rally in Macon, GA, for a 2025 USA Pickleball Golden Ticket tournament! Tournament takes place from March 12-16, 2025.

settings.heading: UTR Sports: Overland Park Open
settings.description: Get ready for elite pickleball at Elite Tennis and Wellness in Overland Park, KS. This NEW USA Pickleball Golden Ticket will take place from May 14-18, 2025.

settings.heading: UTR Sports: St. George Open
settings.description: Head to beautiful St. George, UT, for this NEW 2025 USA Pickleball Golden Ticket from May 28-June 1, 2025.

settings.heading: Coming to punta gorda in October
settings.description: The Pickleplex in Punta Gorda, Florida, will host a Pickleball Amateur Series stop from Oct. 18-20, 2024.

settings.heading: PAS STAYS IN ATLANTA
settings.description: Improve your UTR-P Rating at another UTR Sports pickleball tournament in Atlanta, from Oct. 19-20.

settings.description: Head to Decatur, GA, for another chance to meet new players and improve your game!

settings.heading: Amateur Series Returns to Atlanta
settings.description: Atlanta will host another pickleball tournament as part of Pickleball Amateur Series in late November.

settings.heading: PICKLEBALL SERIES COMING TO CANTON, GA
settings.description: The Bridgemill Athletic Club is eager to welcome the UTR Sports Pickleball Amateur Series on Saturday, May 4, 2024.

settings.heading: Series continues in the ATLANTA AREA!
settings.description: Agape Pickleball is thrilled to welcome a special Pickleball Amateur Series event on May 11.

settings.heading: Get ready for Golden Ticket event!
settings.description: From May 24-26, get warmed-up for the UTR Sports Macon Golden Ticket event.

settings.heading: Next stop for the series: Chatham, NJ
settings.description: Amateur players can expect quality competition June 28-30, 2024 at the Centercourt Athletic Club of Chatham.

settings.heading: WATCH: UTR SPORTS HOSTS MACON GOLDEN TICKET OPEN
The Pickleball CHAMPIONSHIPS
settings.description: The 2024 UTR Sports Pickleball Amateur Series Championships will feature the best players across the country who competed in the Qualifier Events. These players will go head-to-head to see who will be crowned UTR Sports Pickleball Amateur Series Champions.

settings.heading: Player-Focused Format
settings.description: Round robin-group format allows players to get as many matches as possible (guaranteed eight games).

settings.heading: Competitive Play
settings.description: All divisions will be broken up into groups by level (level-based) to provide the most competitive experience possible for all players.

settings.heading: Premium Venues
settings.description: All events will be played at high-quality pickleball facilities around the country with dedicated pickleball courts to create a first-class experience.

settings.heading: WHY PLAY IN THE UTR SPORTS PICKLEBALL AMATEUR SERIES?

settings.description-title: Pickleball Flex Leagues are live across the U.S.! Become a free UTR Sports member, receive your UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P), and register today!

  • Get “match tough” with 4 matches over 5 weeks

settings.heading: NEW TO UTR SPORTS PICKLEBALL?
settings.description: UTR Sports has the world-class UTR Pickleball Rating and offers pickleball tournaments and leagues throughout the country. Find more ways to play pickleball near you!

settings.heading: WHAT IS UTR PICKLEBALL RATING?
settings.description: Players without match results receive a provisional UTR-P (P1-P5) based on questionnaire results. After a few matches, this converts to a reliable decimal rating on a scale of 1-10.0.

settings.heading: Is there a minimum skill level required to enter?
settings.row_content: No, players are assigned to group in order of their UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P). Click here to learn more about the UTR Pickleball Rating.

settings.heading: What if I don’t have a UTR-P rating?
settings.row_content: All players new to UTR Sports will receive a provisional UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P) based up the questionnaire they completed at the time they created their profile.

settings.heading: Will players play against players near their own skill level?
settings.row_content: Yes, players are assigned to groups in order of their UTR Pickleball Rating (UTR-P).

settings.heading: Do the pickleball tournaments provide doubles partners?
settings.row_content: No, players are responsible for finding their own partners. Individuals in need of a partner can add themselves to the “Needing a Partner” list. Players are able to contact each other via the list to form teams.

settings.heading: Have more questions about the UTR Pickleball Rating?
settings.row_content: Find more FAQs at the UTR Pickleball Rating page.
